1.1.1 #Components.Buttons.SizeModifiers Size modifiers

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

.button--lg .button--sm .button--block

Markup: buttons/button.hbs 
<a class="button {{modifier_class}}" href="#0" role="button">Link</a>

<input class="button {{modifier_class}}" type="button" value="Input">
